original_text: When Nebuchadnezzar had been king for two years, he had many dreams. He had trouble in his mind and he could not sleep.
korean_text: 느부갓네살이 다스린 지 이 년이 되는 해에 느부갓네살이 꿈을 꾸고 그로 말미암아 마음이 번민하여 잠을 이루지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: When Nebuchadnezzar had been king for two years
sentences.korean_translation: 느부갓네살이 왕이 된 지 이년 동안

sentences.original_text: He had trouble in his mind
